description: A LightningJS component named 'SidebarFilters' that displays current recipe filters and allows users to cycle through filter options (cuisine, difficulty, max time) via remote control keys. It manages state, templates UI, and updates filters in central store.

classes.name: SidebarFilters
classes.description: LightningJS component enabling user interaction with recipe filters, including display and cycling through options.

methods.name: updateFilters
methods.description: Updates the application filters with the current selections.

methods.name: mounted
methods.description: Initializes filter indices from the global store state when component is mounted.
